subject: Special Issue on "Recent Trends and Techniques in Computing Information Intelligence"
body:
Dear Dr. Khosmood,

I am writing to let you know about our upcoming Special Issue on "Recent Trends and Techniques in Computing Information Intelligence," which will be published in the Computer Science subject area of The Scientific World Journal in October 2015. You can find the Call for Papers for this Special Issue at http://www.hindawi.com/journals/tswj/si/476059/cfp/ and the deadline for submission is May 15, 2015. The Special Issue is open to both original research articles as well as review articles.

The Scientific World Journal is a peer-reviewed, open access journal, which means that all published articles are made freely available online without a subscription, and authors retain the copyright of their work. Moreover, all published articles will be made available on PubMed Central and indexed in PubMed at the time of publication.

Please read over the journal's Author Guidelines at http://www.hindawi.com/journals/tswj/guidelines/ for more information on the journal's policies and the submission process. Manuscripts should be submitted online to the journal at http://mts.hindawi.com/submit/journals/tswj/computer.science/rtci/.

Please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions about this Special Issue or about the journal.

Best regards,

Reem Ali

--
--------------------------------
Reem Ali
Editorial Office
The Scientific World Journal
Hindawi Publishing Corporation
http://www.hindawi.com
--------------------------------
